title: PBS KIDS: Building a login system for kids and teens in Python
summary:
Our challenge was to create a login system for little people who might
barely read, maybe no email, perhaps no home computer. And we had to
watch out for privacy laws - especially tough for minors. But these kids
want to play games, write stories, and create online avatars to share
and compete against their buddies. Listen to how we developed the PBS
KIDS login and moderation system in Django.
